posts.post_title: WTB PSA 2 or SGC 30 T206 Walter Johnson Portrait - Acquired
posts.post_content: WTB PSA 2 or SGC 30 T206 Walter Johnson Portrait.  Please PM me if you have one available for sale.  Not looking for rare backs, to keep it affordable.
